welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Heinsberg, Germany! Get ready to experience the charm of this quaint town and immerse yourself in its rich history, culture, and delicious cuisine. Enjoy your stay and don't forget to explore all that Heinsberg has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geilenkirchen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aachen/Merzbruck Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Aachen/Merzbruck Airport, mainly used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kempen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kempen Airport, handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
